overview:
Jonathan is in charge of building out Future Ads’ fast-growing network of advertisers - and making sure their campaigns are smart, scaled right, and fully optimized for success. He brings deep experience in online marketing in general - and contextual marketing and media buying, specifically - to Future Ads’ advertising partners. Prior to joining the company in 2006, he was Director of Email, Contextual and Co-Registration for Mindset Interactive; Senior Sales Manager and Media Buyer for Vista Interactive Media; and Director of Media Buying for the full-service ad agency, Sinaloa Group (where he trained and led a team of media buyers). He holds a B.S from Biola University in Business and Marketing.

Jonathan enjoys anything that has to do with water (whether warm or frozen), and loves to surf, snowboard and wakeboard. And, as a Lakers fanatic, he bleeds purple and gold.
